name: Nuravil Conflict
description:
A top-down shooter set in a fantasy land where a nameless hero escapes from the prisons of Nuravil and finds a way to defeat the evil entity behind all the chaos and conflict.

  • A fast-paced tactical real-time combat system with devious enemy AI and throwable exploding corpses.
  • Collect useful items that will help during combat or unlock passages.
  • Explore many unique locations, including but not limited to old shrines, freezing mountains, and other dimensions.
  • Meet several different characters who will help or hinder your journey through the land.
  • Discover hidden areas and find the megasecret!

Download the free demo now to play the first of four chapters for free!
